word_mean_info__list.difference: 指在事实与证据面前勉强或不得不承认。
通常指公开承认某事的真实情况或自己的过错。
作“承认”解时，系书面用词，主要指合法的或外交上的承认，也指公认。
强调因外力或良心驱使或经判断而明确承认，多含不情愿或被迫意味。
语气较强，着重承认自己意识到的错误或罪行，含坦白忏悔的意味。
指所辨认的人或物多是以前所熟悉的。
指辨别、确定人的身份或物品的归属等。
通常指通过人的感觉器官来辨别事物。

word_group.brief_definition: 意识到危险；认识到危险

bilingual.source: He recognize his family in the photo.
bilingual.target: 他在照片中认出了自己的家人。

bilingual.source: I recognize my old friend on the street.
bilingual.target: 我在街上认出了我的老朋友。

bilingual.source: She could recognize him with just a glance.
bilingual.target: 她只需要一眼就能认出他。

bilingual.source: Can you recognize who painted this picture?
bilingual.target: 你能认出这张画是谁画的吗？
我能在任何地方认出他的书写。

bilingual.source: Even with a mask on, I can recognize her.
bilingual.target: 即使戴着口罩，我也能认出她。

bilingual.source: She didn't recognize him after so many years.
bilingual.target: 这么多年后，她没有认出他。

bilingual.source: She quickly recognize the melody of the song.
bilingual.target: 她很快认出了那首歌的旋律。

bilingual.source: The farmer could recognize each pig by its unique oink.
bilingual.target: 农夫能通过每只猪独特的叫声认出它们。

list.abstract: 《Recognize》是SP Double于2012年发行的一首歌曲。

yingyinNormal.en: You put a lot of these men in here. What? You didn't think one would recognize you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这里有很多人是你抓进来的怎么? 你认为没人能够认出你?

yingyinNormal.en: What are you doing here? What are you doing here? I came with Paul. Yeah, I recognize the ankles.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在这里干嘛？你又在这里干嘛？我是跟保罗来的。我认出他的脚踝了。

yingyinNormal.en: Kris will see me and recognize me as one of her own with my lips, my boobs, and my willingness to live in some place called Calabasas.
yingyinNormal.zh: 克丽丝只要看我一眼，就能认出我是她的孩子，会被我的丰唇，我的巨乳，还有我想住进洛杉矶豪宅的决心所打动。

yingyinNormal.en: I recognize that neck. Frank Underwood, as I live and breathe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这脖子我一眼就认出来了。弗兰克·安德伍德吗，真没想到。

yingyinNormal.en: I recognize you. Did you help him hide the child?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我认得你。你帮他们把那孩子藏了起来？

yingyinNormal.en: So Jack, anything you recognize, buddy, Jack, anything?
yingyinNormal.zh: 杰克，还能记起点什么，任何事？

yingyinNormal.en: You're speaking to the president. Yes, I recognize his voice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在跟总统说话。是的，我认得出他的声音。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, bees are genetically designed to recognize royalty.
yingyinNormal.zh: 蜜蜂是等级深远的物种，生来就会臣服于皇族。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you recognize her? No. Really? Because she seemed to recognize you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你认识她吗？不。真的？她看起来认识你。

yingyinNormal.en: I recognize that supporting me as you did must have been difficult.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我也知道让你支持我的工作很困难。

yingyinNormal.en: You probably recognize me from a little show called The Days of Our Lives.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你或许有看过我演的一出小戏叫做《那个我们的日子》。

yingyinNormal.en: So, I've been analyzing the gem inside. You may recognize. Jarvis? Doctor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以我一直在分析宝石内部，你可能认得出来... 贾维斯？博士。

yingyinNormal.en: However, we must recognize we are doomed if we allow the dead to govern us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我们也得认识到，如果让先人管束我们，就只有死路一条。

yingyinNormal.en: There are going to be 2,500 performers tonight, one of whom you might just recognize.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今晚将有多达2500人的表演者参与，其中有一人你也许认识。

yingyinNormal.en: If he was your friend, what's his name? That slipped my mind. Did you recognize him at all?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果他是你朋友，那他叫什么？只是突然想不起来了。你认得他的样子吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I don't know. The place has probably changed so much, you wouldn't even recognize it anymore.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我也说不清，也许这里变化太大了，都快认不出来了。

yingyinNormal.en: But the good thing about being Homer Simpson is that if you recognize when we're Homer Simpson.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是做辛普森也有他的好处，那就是如果你意识到你何时会变成辛普森。

yingyinNormal.en: That is your make out buddy. Don't you recognize him? Oh, wait. Oh, Phoebe I love you. Kiss me please.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是你的亲热对象，你不认得吗？等等，菲比，我爱你，吻我。

yingyinNormal.en: You say you recognize the scratch? I wish to confirm this belief before I tarnish his name any further.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你说你认识绘制此图的笔法？我想先进一步确认，然后再说出此人的名字。

yingyinNormal.en: Those flower power skanks over there. "flower power skanks." See, these are words I recognize and hear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那边两个穿大花的傻妞。"穿大花的傻妞"，这才是跟姐说话要用的词儿。

认可; 公认; 赞赏

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 认识；识别；认可；承认；确认；表彰；赏识；认出；外交承认
adj. 经过验证的；公认的

word_family.mean: v. 认出；认识；承认；确认；认可；识别；辨别；表彰；赏识；自动识别

sense_info_list.en: acknowledge the existence, validity, or legality of

examination_example.sentence: Humility requires you to <highlight>recognize</highlight> weakness in your own arguments and sometimes also to accept reasons on the opposite side.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 谦逊需要你认识到自己论点中的弱点，有时也需要接受相反的理由。

examination_example.sentence: Now we can understand each other's positions and <highlight>recognize</highlight> our shared values, since we both care about needy workers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在我们可以理解彼此的立场，认识到我们共同的价值观，因为我们都关心有需要的工人。

examination_example.sentence: Failing to <highlight>recognize</highlight> that leads to "an overly simplified view of what the solutions might be.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果没有认识到这一点，就会导致“对解决方案的看法过于简单化”。

sense_info_list.en: identify someone or something from having encountered them before
sense_info_list.zh: 认识; 认出; 辨别出

examination_example.sentence: Investing energy in a body system which <highlight>recognizes</highlight> a threat and can feel pain would be a very poor evolutionary strategy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将能量投入到一个能够识别威胁并能感觉到疼痛的身体系统中，是一个非常糟糕的进化策略。

examination_example.sentence: To start, we can <highlight>recognize</highlight> the new birds of passage, those living and thriving in the gray areas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先，我们可以识别出新的候鸟，那些生活在灰色地带并在那里茁壮成长的候鸟。

sense_info_list.en: officially accept it or approve of it
sense_info_list.zh: 认可; 公认; 赞赏

examination_example.sentence: Generation Zs graduating college this spring are <highlight>recognized</highlight> for their abilities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今年春天大学毕业的Z一代因其能力而得到认可。

word_usage.usage: recognize是及物动词，接名词或代词作宾语，也可接that从句或疑问词从句作宾语。

表示“认出”
recognize指认出原先见过、听过、经历过的人或事物。
identify指辨别、确定人的身份或物品的归属等。
make out通常指通过人的感觉器官(眼、耳)来辨别事物。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指认出原来曾经见过或听到过的某人或某物。
指证实或识别某人的身份或认出某物是谁的或是什么。
指通过感觉器官清楚的认出或区别。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: identify someone or something from having encountered them before

examination_example.sentence: We easily <highlight>recognize</highlight> that there is great variation among the individuals who live near us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们很容易认识到，居住在我们附近的人之间有很大的差异。

examination_example.sentence: Computer can process what it sees--then <highlight>recognize</highlight> a face it's told to find--with remarkable speed and precision.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 计算机能够以惊人的速度和精准性处理所看到的东西，从而识别出要找的脸孔。

examination_example.sentence: The scientific community is <highlight>recognizing</highlight> that data can now be shared digitally in ways that were not possible before.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学社区正在意识到，现在数据可以用前所未有的方式进行数字共享。

sense_info_list.en: officially accept it or approve of it

examination_example.sentence: Creating this sanctuary is a bold move that the people of Palau <highlight>recognize</highlight> as essential to our survival.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 创建这个避难所是一个大胆的举动，帕劳（Palau）人认为这对我们的生存至关重要。

sense_info_list.en: acknowledge the existence, validity, or legality of

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 认识；识别；认可；承认；确认；表彰；赏识；认出；外交承认
adj. 可认出的；可辨认的；可认识的

word_family.mean: v. 认出；认识；承认；确认；认可；识别；辨别；表彰；赏识；自动识别

sense_info_list.en: acknowledge the existence; validity; or legality of

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>recognize</highlight> that numbers are organized sequentially, but have little awareness of what each individual number means.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们认识到数字是按顺序组合的，但对每个数字的含义知之甚少。

examination_example.sentence: Technology is a great tool; however, it's important to <highlight>recognize</highlight> its downsides.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科技是一个极好的工具；然而，认识到它的缺点是很重要的。

examination_example.sentence: They just don't <highlight>recognize</highlight> it right now as particularly valuable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们只是现在不认为它特别有价值。

sense_info_list.en: officially accept it or approve of it

examination_example.sentence: And now, the World Health Organization has <highlight>recognized</highlight> addiction to computer games as a disease.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，世界卫生组织已经将沉迷于电脑游戏认作一种疾病。

examination_example.sentence: Grant awarders tend to favor researchers already <highlight>recognized</highlight> in their respective fields.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 资助人倾向于支持在各自领域已经得到认可的研究人员。

examination_example.sentence: It's easier for those in positions of power to choose to hand awards and funding to those who've already been so <highlight>recognized</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于那些掌权的人来说，更容易选择将奖项和资金交给那些已经获得如此认可的人。

sense_info_list.en: identify someone or something from having encountered them before

examination_example.sentence: Many women say their physicians sometimes don't even <highlight>recognize</highlight> the symptoms."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多女性表示，她们的医生有时甚至没有意识到这些症状。”

examination_example.sentence: We must be handed the cognitive tools of numbers before we can consistently and easily <highlight>recognize</highlight> higher quantities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们必须先掌握数字的认知工具，才能始终如一地、轻松地识别更大的数量。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 认出；认识；承认；确认；认可；识别；辨别；表彰；赏识；自动识别

sense_info_list.en: officially accept it or approve of it

examination_example.sentence: Komodo National Park, officially <highlight>recognized</highlight> in, is popular for ecotourism because of its unique biodiversity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 官方认可的科莫多国家公园因其独特的生物多样性而受到生态旅游业的欢迎。

examination_example.sentence: Since 1958, they have been <highlight>recognized</highlight> as the national theatre of Israel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自1958年以来，它们被公认为以色列的国家剧院。

examination_example.sentence: James Brindley is <highlight>recognized</highlight> as one of the leading early canal engineers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 詹姆斯·布林德利被认为是早期运河的主要工程师之一。

sense_info_list.en: identify someone or something from having encountered them before

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Recognizes</highlight> the speech sounds it receives
examination_example.sentence_trans: 识别它接收到的语音

examination_example.sentence: At this point, it is not clear why dogs seem to be equipped with the ability to <highlight>recognize</highlight> different facial expressions in humans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这一点上，尚不清楚为什么狗似乎具备识别人类不同面部表情的能力。

examination_example.sentence: Data collected from the device could be used to <highlight>recognize</highlight> different participants based on how they typed, with very low error rates.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从该设备收集的数据可以根据不同的参与者的打字方式来识别他们，错误率非常低。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 认出；认识；承认；确认；认可；识别；辨别；表彰；赏识；自动识别

sense_info_list.en: identify someone or something from having encountered them before

examination_example.sentence: Because it can’t <highlight>recognize</highlight> (认出) itself in the mirror.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为它不能在镜子里认出自己。

examination_example.sentence: Jason could hardly <highlight>recognize</highlight> the buildings in front of him because of all the damage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 杰森几乎认不出他面前的建筑，因为所有的损坏。

examination_example.sentence: They are difficult to <highlight>recognize</highlight> and find.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们很难辨认也很难找。

sense_info_list.en: officially accept it or approve of it

examination_example.sentence: If we all <highlight>recognize</highlight> the value of doing this, we will live longer and be healthier.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们都认识到这样做的价值，我们就会活得更长，更健康。

examination_example.sentence: This time, Jozef was interviewed by TV and has been <highlight>recognized</highlight> by not just fans, but millions of Chinese TV audience.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一次，约瑟夫接受了电视采访，不仅得到了粉丝的认可，也得到了数百万中国电视观众的认可。

examination_example.sentence: But now they are <highlight>recognized</highlight> by young people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但现在他们得到了年轻人的认可。
